cards.name: King Robb's Host
cards.text: No attachments. Reaction: After you win a [military] challenge in which King Robb's Host is participating, move 1 power from the losing opponent's faction card to an attacking character. (2 power instead if there is a War plot card revealed.)

cards.name: Catelyn Stark
cards.text: Catelyn Stark gets +1 STR for each power she has. Reaction: After a [stark] character you control is sacrificed or killed, Catelyn Stark gains 1 power. (Limit twice per round.)

cards.name: Eddard Stark
cards.text: Renown. Reaction: After Eddard Stark gains power using renown, choose another participating character you control. That character gains 1 power.

cards.name: The Blackfish
cards.text: Renown. While The Blackfish has 4 or more power, each House Tully character you control does not kneel when declared as an attacker. Reaction: After you win a [military] challenge as the attacking player, draw 1 card. (Limit once per phase.)

cards.name: Jon Snow
cards.text: Action: Sacrifice a [stark] character to choose and stand a unique [stark] character. (Limit once per round.)

cards.name: Wolves of the North
cards.text: No attachments. Stealth. Reaction: After Wolves of the North bypasses a character using stealth, that character gets -X STR until the end of the phase. X is the number of Direwolf cards you control.

cards.name: Arya Stark
cards.text: Reaction: After a [stark] character you control is killed, sacrifice Arya Stark to choose and kill a character with STR 3 or lower.

cards.name: Jory Cassel
cards.text: Interrupt: When a unique [stark] character you control would be killed, sacrifice Jory Cassel to save it. Then, if there is a Winter plot card revealed, that character gains 1 power.

cards.name: Riverrun Minstrel
cards.text: Reaction: After Riverrun Minstrel enters play, choose a House Tully character. That character gains 1 power.

cards.name: Old Nan
cards.text: Interrupt: When a plot card is revealed, kneel Old Nan to have that plot card gain the Summer or Winter trait until the end of the round.

cards.name: Osha
cards.text: Challenges Action: Remove Osha from the challenge. Then, stand her. (Limit once per phase.)

cards.name: Bear Island Loyalist
cards.text: While Bear Island Loyalist is participating in a challenge, each other participating [stark] character you control gains "immune to opponents' events."

cards.name: Sansa Stark
cards.text:
Sansa Stark gets -1 STR for each [stark] character in your dead pile.
While Sansa Stark's STR is 0, she gains insight.

cards.name: Shaggydog
cards.text:
No attachments.
While you control Rickon Stark, he gets +2 STR and gains a [military] icon.

cards.name: House Tully Septon
cards.text: Marshaling Action: Discard 1 power from a character you control to reduce the cost of the next House Tully or The Seven character you marshal this phase by 2. (Limit once per phase.)

cards.name: Rickon Stark
cards.text: Interrupt: When the effects of a triggered ability with the word "search" in it would initiate, sacrifice Rickon Stark to cancel those effects.

cards.name: Winterfell
cards.text: Each [stark] character you control gets +1 STR. Reaction: After a challenge is initiated, kneel Winterfell. Then, each player with a non-Winter plot card revealed cannot trigger card abilities until the end of the challenge.

cards.name: Winterfell Heart Tree
cards.text: Reaction: After a phase begins, sacrifice Winterfell Heart Tree to choose a [stark] card you control. Until the end of the phase, that card gains "immune to opponents' plot effects."

cards.name: Nymeria
cards.text: Unique [stark] character only. Attached character gains intimidate. Action: Pay 1 gold to attach Nymeria to a different character. (Limit once per phase.)

cards.name: Needle
cards.text: [stark] character only. Attached character gets +2 STR. Interrupt: When attached character is sacrificed, sacrifice Needle to return that character to your hand instead of placing it in your discard pile.

cards.name: Frozen Solid
cards.text: Non-limited location with printed cost 3 or lower only. Terminal. Treat attached location's printed text box as if it were blank (except for Traits).

cards.name: As Hard as Winter
cards.text: Play only if there is a Winter plot card in your used pile. Reaction: After a [stark] character you control is sacrificed or killed, put a [stark] character with equal or lower printed cost into play from your hand.

cards.name: The Pack Survives
cards.text: Interrupt: When the effects of an opponent's event would initiate, sacrifice a Direwolf card or kneel 2 [stark] characters to cancel those effects.

cards.name: Arya's Gift
cards.text: Action: Move an attachment from a [stark] character you control to another eligible character you control.

cards.name: Motley
cards.text: Opponent's character only. Attached character gains the Fool trait. Reaction: After attached character is declared as an attacker or defender, discard 1 card at random from its controller's hand.

cards.name: Even Handed Justice
cards.text: Action: Choose a standing character controlled by each player. Kneel each of those characters.

cards.name: Fishwhiskers
cards.text: While Fishwhiskers is attacking, if there are more Winter plot cards than Summer plot cards revealed, each defending character does not contribute its STR to that challenge.

cards.name: Ahead of the Tide
cards.text: Interrupt: When you compare initiative, your revealed plot card gets +3 initiative until the end of the phase. If you win initiative this phase, draw 1 card.

cards.name: Crossroads Sellsword
cards.text: Interrupt: When Crossroads Sellsword is killed during the challenges phase, gain 2 gold.

cards.name: Tower of the Hand
cards.text: Reaction: After you win an [intrigue] challenge, kneel Tower of the Hand and return a participating [lannister] character to your hand to choose a character with lower printed cost controlled by the losing opponent. Return that character to its owner's hand.

cards.name: Quentyn Martell
cards.text: While you are not the first player, Quentyn Martell gets +1 STR and gains stealth. Interrupt: When Quentyn Martell is killed, choose and kill a character with a lower STR than his.

cards.name: His Viper Eyes
cards.text: Reaction: After you lose a [military] or [power] challenge as the defending player, look at the winning opponent's hand. Then, choose and discard 1 card from that hand.

cards.name: Stonesnake
cards.text: Stealth. Reaction: After Stonesnake bypasses a character using stealth, choose one of that character's keywords. Stonesnake gains that keyword until the end of the phase.

cards.name: The Shadow Tower
cards.text: Reaction: After you win a challenge as the defending player, kneel The Shadow Tower to choose a character controlled by the losing opponent. That character cannot be declared as an attacker this phase.

cards.name: Aggo
cards.text: Action: If there is a Summer plot card revealed, choose and stand a Bloodrider character. (Limit once per round.)

cards.name: Dragon Sight
cards.text: Action: Each participating non-Dragon character gets -1 STR until the end of the challenge.

cards.name: House Florent Knight
cards.text: Forced Reaction: After House Florent Knight enters play, choose a character with the lowest STR in play, and discard it from play.

cards.name: To the Rose Banner!
cards.text: Marshaling Action: Choose a [tyrell] character you control. Gain X gold, where X is that character's STR. Then, sacrifice that character.

cards.name: Mance Rayder
cards.text: Renown. Each Wildling character in your hand gains ambush (X). X is that card's printed cost. While there is a Winter plot card revealed, reduce the cost to ambush each of your Wildling characters by 1.

cards.name: Young Spearwife
cards.text: While you have less power on your faction card than an opponent, Young Spearwife gains stealth.

cards.name: Tourney Grounds
cards.text: Action: Kneel Tourney Grounds to reduce the cost of the next event you play this phase by 1.

cards.name: Green Dreams
cards.text: Terminal. Reaction: After attached character is knelt, look at the top card of your deck. You may put that card on the bottom of your deck.

cards.name: Healing Expertise
cards.text: Interrupt: When a non-Army character you control would be killed, kneel a Maester character to save it.

cards.name: Tithe
cards.text: Action: Kneel a neutral character to gain 2 gold.

cards.name: A Time For Wolves
cards.text: When Revealed: Search your deck for a Direwolf card, reveal it, and add it to your hand. If that card's printed cost is 3 or lower, you may put it into play instead. Shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Fallen from Favor
cards.text: When Revealed: Sacrifice a character you control.

cards.name: Snowed Under
cards.text: Treat the base initiative value on each revealed plot card as if it were 0.

cards.name: The Long Winter
cards.text: When Revealed: Each player without a Summer plot revealed discards 1 power from a card he or she controls.

cards.name: A Song of Summer
cards.text: While there are no Winter plot cards revealed, each character you control gets +1 STR.

cards.name: Weapons at the Door
cards.text: Forced Reaction: After the challenges phase begins, return each card with the printed attachment cardtype to its owner's hand.

cards.name: Ranger's Cache
cards.text: Interrupt: When the taxation phase ends, either: draw 2 cards or gain 3 gold.
